participant_1.background:
I had to put my dog down.
i aspire to be a millionaire.
i watch every football game at alabama.
i prefer the simpler times.
i like to go on long hikes.

participant_2.background:
I've been hiding my financial troubles from my parents.
i am a truck driver in the south.
i met my husband when i was a freshman in college.
i worry about money even though i m in high school.
My vintage cars are my pride and joy.

content.text: It's going well! I just had to put my dog down yesterday, but I'm doing okay.
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. I know how much you loved your dog.
Thank you, I appreciate that. I've been trying to focus on the good times we had together.
That's a good way to think about it. I know it's hard, but try to remember all the happy memories you made with him.
I will. He was a great dog and I'm going to miss him a lot.
I'm sure you will. But he's not really gone, he's just waiting for you on the other side.
That's a nice way to think about it. Thank you.
You're welcome. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go on long hikes, watch football, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to go on hikes too, but I don't watch football.
That's cool. What do you do for fun?
I like to drive my truck, work on my vintage cars, and hang out with my husband.
That sounds like fun too. I've always wanted to learn how to drive a truck.
It's not hard, you just have to be careful.
I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
